rows.controlDescription: Company and Supplier may Process the other's BCI wherever they do business in connection with Supplier's delivery of Services and Deliverables.

A party will not use or disclose the other's BCI for any other purpose and will delete, modify, correct, return, provide information about the Processing, or restrict the Processing promptly on written request.
The parties are not entering a joint Controller relationship regarding each other's BCI and no provision of the Transaction Document will be interpreted as such.

rows.controlCategory: Article II, Technical and Organizational Measures
rows.controlDescription: Supplier will comply with requirements in providing all Services and Deliverables, and by doing so protect Company Data against loss and unlawful forms of Processing.

The parties are not entering a joint Controller relationship regarding each other's BCI and no provision of the Transaction Document will be interpreted as indicating any intent to establish a joint Controller relationship.
A party will not use or disclose the other's BCI for any marketing purpose without the prior written consent of affected Data Subjects.

rows.controlCategory: Article VIII, Technical and Organizational Measures
rows.controlDescription: Supplier will review its IT security policies and practices at least annually and amend them as necessary to protect Company Materials.
